decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposal would lead to the loss of an attractive building which makes a positive contribution to the character and appearance of the Conservation Area. It would thereby be contrary to Policy ENV 1.2 of the Adopted Unitary Development Plan (1996) and Policy ENV- B.2.2 of the Proposed Unitary Development Plan (2001).

Condition : 2 - The size, bulk and design of the proposed building would be out of character with and detrimental to the streetscene and the Osterley Park Conservation Area. It would thereby be contrary to Policies ENV.1.1 and ENV 1.2 of the Adopted Unitary Development Plan (1996) and Policies ENV-B.1.1 and ENV- B.2.2 of the Proposed Unitary Development Plan (2001).
description: Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of five bedrooms detached dwellinghouse.
